ant.run:
[copy todir="${generatedSources}"] [fileset dir="${basedir}/byte-buddy-dep/src/main/java"/] [fileset dir="${basedir}/byte-buddy-agent/src/main/java"/] [/copy]
[replaceregexp flags="g"] [regexp pattern=".*SuppressFBWarnings.*"/] [substitution expression=""/] [fileset dir="${generatedSources}"] [include name="**/*.java"/] [/fileset] [/replaceregexp]
